law.catch_line: Service fee for hardship driving privileges.
law.text: All persons granted hardship driving privileges shall pay a service fee to the Transportation Cabinet an amount not to exceed the actual cost to the Cabinet for issuing the permit card and decal, but not to exceed two hundred dollars ($200).
law.history: Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 29, effective July 1, 1991.
